PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: PSCs fabricated with the PffBB-n:PC71BM blend , conducted at 80 °C optimized coating temperature , showed relatively high power conversion efficiency ( PCE ) ranging from 8.22 to 9.93% .

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PCE |
| PffBB-n:PC71BM blend |
| coating temperature |

Note:

* PCE stands for power conversion efficiency.
* PffBB-n:PC71BM blend refers to a blend of PffBB and PC71BM, which are materials used in the fabrication of perovskite solar cells (PSCs).
* coating temperature refers to the temperature at which the PSCs were fabricated.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PCE |

The following entities do not clearly refer to material properties:

* PffBB-n:PC71BM blend (this is a material composition, not a property)
* coating temperature (this is a process parameter, not a property)

Therefore, the only valid entity that refers to a material property in the given paragraph is PCE (power conversion efficiency).

* 8.22% (lower range of power conversion efficiency)
* 9.93% (upper range of power conversion efficiency)

The following entities do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and were removed from the table:

* "PSCs" (referring to "photovoltaic cells" instead of a material property)
* "PffBB-n:PC71BM" (referring to a material composition instead of a material property)
* "coating temperature" (referring to a process parameter instead of a material property)
